verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thou art my hiding place,
Thou art my hiding place,
Thou shalt preserve me from trouble.
Thou shalt compass me about,
With songs of deliverance.
What time I am afraid, I shall trust in Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Alternatively:
You are my hiding place.
You are my hiding place.
You will preserve me from trouble.
You will compass me about,
With songs of deliverance.
What time I am afraid,
I will trust in You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Por que tu eres mi refugio,
Por que tu eres mi refugio,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tu me guardaras en el dia de mi angustia,
Y me rodearas con cantos de liberacion,
Cuando temor tengo yo confiare en ti.
